title: The Billionaire's Unlikely Bride
description: Elle is single and living in the City with her best friend Brittany. Brittany has a plan to have them both married off to billionaires and Elle can't help but go along.Peter Branford is the young billionaire that Brittany wants Elle to fall in love with but there are a couple of people who don't want to see that happen: Olivia, Peter's icy mother and Elliott Rosewood, Brittany's dad and a figure from Elle's past.This is a spicy romantic novella that will have readers believing in hot romance again. This book contains book 1 and book 2 of the series.
author: Helen    Cooper
